title: Coleen Rooney feared Rebekah Vardy was 'overshadowing her brand'
text:
Rebekah Vardy is ‘inconsolable’ (Picture: Backgrid/Rex)

Rebekah Vardy is ‘inconsolable’ over Coleen Rooney’s accusations that she sold fake stories to newspapers for cash with sources suggesting that Coleen went public over fears the Vardy’s were ‘overshadowing’ them.

The wife of Jamie Vardy was on holiday in Dubai with her family when Coleen’s claims went online, with the 33-year-old alleging that she masterminded a scheme to expose her fellow WAG.

Vardy has denied all the allegations and it is thought she has now called on lawyers to find out who had access to her Instagram and when.

However now pals close to Vardy have suggested that one reason why Coleen published her allegations so publicly was because of the Vardy brand.

‘Becky and Jamie are always happy. There is no scandal with their marriage,’ the source told The Mirror.

‘Maybe to Coleen’s camp, they were overshadowing them and becoming a bigger brand and that’s why this has been so public.’

Coleen Rooney accused Vardy of selling fake stories (Picture: Backgrid)

The insider added that Vardy has been left ‘inconsolable’.

‘She’s crying her eyes out and is heavily pregnant. Coleen knew Becky and was friendly with her and she didn’t know there were any issues,’ they continued.

‘Now she’s getting relentlessly trolled and is just beside herself.’

Rebekah and Jamie Vardy have been married for several years (Picture: Getty Images)

However, the Rooneys have hit back, with pals denying her claims are part of any plan or grudge.

‘Coleen has never been interested in being a brand, that’s nonsense,’ the friend told The Mirror.

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Coleen for comment.

WAGs Coleen and Rebekah crossed paths at football matches when their husbands were playing (Picture: Rex)

Rooney made the accusations on Instagram, alleging that she set up a plot to expose her fellow WAG.

Coleen wrote: ‘For a few years now someone I trusted to follow me on my personal Instagram account has been consistently informing The Sun newspaper of my private posts and stories.

‘There has been so much information given to them about me, my friends and my family – all without my permission or knowledge. After a long time of trying to figure out who it could be, for various reasons, I had a suspicion. To try and prove this, I came up with an idea. I blocked everyone from viewing my Instagram stories except ONE account. (Those on my private account must have been wondering why I haven’t had stories on there for a while.)’

Coleen continued: ‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper. And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.

‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to. Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

description: Coleen Rooney accused Rebekah Vardy of selling fake stories to newspapers.
